casebody.data:
Arthur S. Bailey and Luther Bailey v. Meade Bailey, et Als. November 17, 1932.

Present, Campbell, C. J., and Holt, Epes, Hudgins, Gregory and Browning, JJ.

Taylor & Taylor, Charles Curry and Curry Carter, for the plaintiffs in error. Timberlake & Nelson, Charles J. Churchman and Kerr & White, for the defendants in error.

Richmond
